name: GetFutureRuleSuppressions
description:
Retrieve suppressions affecting a future security rule.

Use this tool to get a list of suppressions that would impact a specified security monitoring rule in the future.

parameters.name: suppression_rule_details
parameters.description: A JSON object specifying the rule details to retrieve suppressions affecting it. This should include necessary parameters defining the security policy or rule you are inquiring about.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
